About the Company: Avanti Feeds Ltd is engaged in the production of scientifically formulated and nutritionally balanced water-stable international quality shrimp feed in India. They are also the largest supplier of shrimp feed in the entire coast of India and other countries. The company`s product range includes Shrimp Feed & Frozen Shrimps, they also offer technical services to the shrimp culture farmers at their ponds. The company has three main business divisions i.e. Shrimp Feed Division, Aqua Products Export Division and Shrimp Shell Meal.The company also in the business segment of Wind Mills, Shrimp Feed, Shrimp Processing.
